text: Ur Nattvindar (English: From Night Woods) is the second demo album by the Viking metal band Månegarm. It was recorded in 1997. This album and the band's first demo album, Vargaresa, were combined for the compilation album Vargaresa – The Beginning. == Track listing == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Track number !! Track title !! Translation !! title: Ur Nattvindar
